title: fennic
author: fennic
content: I Know that many members will say many things But I will say That Bitcoin has Given me a source of Income and that make me a partial or ful Independent. There was a time when I do not know what to do and at that time Bitcoin made me feel that I can do anything in this world and still I am Making such good money that's because of crypto and also Bitcointalk. Bitcointalk I have been making 100 Dollars plus through Signatures and my only Desire it to reach Hero member in coming years so that I will be able to make my livings even better. I have generated Almost 150 Dollars plus through Bitcointalk and I want to keep more further in coming days. you can see in my Deposit section as I have been getting Btc per week and that makes me more powerful and also energetic.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: It's interesting seing this and maybe it may serve to encourage some but i wonder how you will still finds this forum interesting without a participation in signature campaign, it's all about helping others across the world with useful information that could be an answer to their questions, research or enquiry about bitcoin, in doing so you also got to improve yourself in knowledge and make some good opportunity right from the forum, but the core value must not be misplaced which is to serve as a discussion platform for everything that concerns bitcoin around the world, keep up the good work and remember the more you grow the more are your delivery expectations to the forum.

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: QuoteEdit your images you are displaying personal information.The foregoing is perhaps one of the main causes of unknowingly beginning to provide information, additionally the use of centralized exchanges is risky or knowingly.On the other hand bitcoin is an annex in the reach of personal goals for many individuals but it should not be the whole, in fact it should be a refuge for a plan C, D, it should not be the main option and not even plan B.QuoteI think there should be a section..." I feel happy with bitcoin," maybe Off-T is the best place, because these stories are always positive in some way.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Good for you, but you should edit this thread since, you are including sensitive information, very sensitive and is dangerous to you in many ways.You are not only talking about your income but you also included you e-mail in those images, which could be enough for someone with bad intentions to try to hack your Binance account, bomb you with fishing emails or in the worst case scenario, they could dox you are extort money out of you (since they alredy know you have money).Please be careful.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: There's a video on bitcointalk show which said bitcointalk signature campaign has changed many people's life. Collecting BTC when it was cheap and holding till bullrun would give them significant amount. Many has got decent amount through this.However, you should never depend on this. This should never be someone's source of income. It's an incentive you are enjoying just because theymos allowed. It may get changed anytime.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: OP, you already have a topic you opened last month:I became Independent Because of Cryptocurrency that was still getting posted a few days ago, so why open one that is almost identical? Fishing for something?Also, what's the point of hiding your email in settings when you show it to everyone in your screenshots?You know you're going to get a ton of phishing emails now, especially since you keep posting both the email and exchange you use! You really need to learn more about keeping things private before you experience the disadvantages of not doing so!

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.created_time: January 05, 2023, 06:02:12 PMLast edit: January 05, 2023, 06:23:32 PM by Zlantann
comments.body: I might not ascertain your intention for starting this thread but I want to appreciate you for being truthful. At least you are open to telling us that the income you make from Bitcoinalk is really helpful financially. Some users would usually pretend that their campaign fund is insignificant.But you don't need to announce your financial achievements because it could attract the wrong people to you. Just ensure you change your email and password immediately in all your accounts to avoid the unbelievable. Quote from: stompix on January 05, 2023, 05:51:27 PMOP, you already have a topic you opened last month:I became Independent Because of Cryptocurrency that was still getting posted a few days ago, so why open one that is almost identical? Fishing for something?OP I know you want to get to your next rank as soon as possible and you need the activity and the other. With time you would get the activity and with quality posts, the other one would come without stress.Good luck and stay safe mate.
